org.apache.juneau.rest.mock2

Class MockRemoteResource<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.mock2.MockRemoteResource<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The interface class.

    public class MockRemoteResource<T>
extends Object
    Creates a mocked interface against a REST resource class to use for creating test remote resource interfaces.
    • Overview > juneau-rest-mock > MockRemoteResource

    • Constructor Detail

      • MockRemoteResource

        protected MockRemoteResource(Class<T> intf,
                             Object impl)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        intf - The remote interface annotated with @RemoteResource.
        impl - The REST implementation bean or bean class annotated with @RestResource.
        If a class, it must have a no-arg constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static <T> MockRemoteResource<T> create(Class<T> intf,
                                               Object impl)
        Create a new builder using the specified remote resource interface and REST implementation bean or bean class.

        Uses JsonSerializer.DEFAULT and JsonParser.DEFAULT for serializing and parsing by default.

        Parameters:
        intf - The remote interface annotated with @RemoteResource.
        impl - The REST implementation bean or bean class annotated with @RestResource.
        If a class, it must have a no-arg constructor.
        Returns:
        A new builder.

      • create

        public static <T> MockRemoteResource<T> create(Class<T> intf,
                                               Object impl,
                                               Marshall m)
        Create a new builder using the specified remote resource interface and REST implementation bean or bean class.

        Uses the serializer and parser defined on the specified marshall for serializing and parsing by default.

        Parameters:
        intf - The remote interface annotated with @RemoteResource.
        impl - The REST implementation bean or bean class annotated with @RestResource.
        If a class, it must have a no-arg constructor.
        m - The marshall to use for serializing and parsing the HTTP bodies.
        Returns:
        A new builder.

      • create

        public static <T> MockRemoteResource<T> create(Class<T> intf,
                                               Object impl,
                                               Serializer s,
                                               Parser p)
        Create a new builder using the specified remote resource interface and REST implementation bean or bean class.

        Uses the serializer and parser defined on the specified marshall for serializing and parsing by default.

        Parameters:
        intf - The remote interface annotated with @RemoteResource.
        impl - The REST implementation bean or bean class annotated with @RestResource.
        If a class, it must have a no-arg constructor.
        s - The serializer to use for serializing request bodies.
        Can be null to force no serializer to be used and no Content-Type header.
        p - The parser to use for parsing response bodies.
        Can be null to force no parser to be used and no Accept header.
        Returns:
        A new builder.

      • build

        public T build()
        Constructs a remote proxy interface based on the settings of this builder.
        Returns:
        A new remote proxy interface.

      • build

        public static <T> T build(Class<T> intf,
                          Object impl)
        Convenience method for getting a remote resource interface.

        Uses JsonSerializer.DEFAULT and JsonParser.DEFAULT for serializing and parsing by default.

        Equivalent to calling the following:

        MockRemoteResource.create(intf, impl).build();

        Parameters:
        intf - The remote interface annotated with @RemoteResource.
        impl - The REST implementation bean or bean class annotated with @RestResource.
        If a class, it must have a no-arg constructor.
        Returns:
        A new proxy interface.

      • build

        public static <T> T build(Class<T> intf,
                          Object impl,
                          Marshall m)
        Convenience method for getting a remote resource interface.

        Uses the serializer and parser defined on the specified marshall for serializing and parsing by default.

        Equivalent to calling the following:

        MockRemoteResource.create(intf, impl).marshall(m).build();

        Parameters:
        intf - The remote interface annotated with @RemoteResource.
        impl - The REST implementation bean or bean class annotated with @RestResource.
        If a class, it must have a no-arg constructor.
        m - The marshall to use for serializing request bodies and parsing response bodies.
        Can be null to force no serializer or parser to be used and no Accept or Content-Type header.
        Returns:
        A new proxy interface.

      • build

        public static <T> T build(Class<T> intf,
                          Object impl,
                          Serializer s,
                          Parser p)
        Convenience method for getting a remote resource interface.

        Uses the specified serializer and parser for serializing and parsing by default.

        Equivalent to calling the following:

        MockRemoteResource.create(intf, impl).serializer(s).parser(p).build();

        Parameters:
        intf - The remote interface annotated with @RemoteResource.
        impl - The REST implementation bean or bean class annotated with @RestResource.
        If a class, it must have a no-arg constructor.
        s - The serializer to use for serializing request bodies.
        Can be null to force no serializer to be used and no Content-Type header.
        p - The parser to use for parsing response bodies.
        Can be null to force no parser to be used and no Accept header.
        Returns:
        A new proxy interface.

      • header

        public MockRemoteResource<T> header(String name,
                                    Object value)
        Adds a header to every request.
        Parameters:
        name - The header name.
        value - The header value.
        Can be null (will be skipped).
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • headers

        public MockRemoteResource<T> headers(Map<String,Object> value)
        Adds the specified headers to every request.
        Parameters:
        value - The header values.
        Can be null (existing values will be cleared).
        null null map values will be ignored.
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • marshall

        public MockRemoteResource<T> marshall(Marshall value)
        Associates the specified Marshall with this client.

        This is shorthand for calling serializer(x) and parser(x) using the inner serializer and parser of the marshall object.

        Parameters:
        value - The marshall to use for serializing and parsing HTTP bodies.
        Can be null (will remote the existing serializer/parser).
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • serializer

        public MockRemoteResource<T> serializer(Serializer value)
        Associates the specified Serializer with this client.
        Parameters:
        value - The serializer to use for serializing HTTP bodies.
        Can be null (will remote the existing serializer).
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).

      • parser

        public MockRemoteResource<T> parser(Parser value)
        Associates the specified Parser with this client.
        Parameters:
        value - The parser to use for parsing HTTP bodies.
        Can be null (will remote the existing parser).
        Returns:
        This object (for method chaining).
